title: After Brief Respite, Conflict In Ukraine Flares Back Up
teaser: After a holiday lull, the war in Ukraine has reignited and is spreading amid signs that Russian troops have been flowing into the region. NPR's Arun Rath talks with Corey Flintoff from Kyiv.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
